title: dgmworld
author: dgmworld
created_time: March 26, 2023, 09:02:42 PMLast edit: April 01, 2023, 06:32:21 PM by dgmworld
content: Hello everyone, we are happy to announce that this old project will reborn, we are a group of holders decided to rebrand and rebuild the entire project. During the next weeks the details will be provided. Starting today we have a few announces and information about the next steps.1- We are in process to contact the first developer and trying to get the old domains, bitcointalk logins, github accounts and more, the project was passed to a second group of developers a few years ago, we are also in contact with this second group trying to get as many information as we can.2- A new domain was registered digimoney.digital, this will be used for the rebranding where everything will be new, except the name and token symbol.3- A new BEP-20 token will be created and all current DGM holders will receive the the new token4- Old DGM token can still be traded on SouthXchange, wallet are online and working 100%. It will be updated in the next weeks with the new domain and nodes.5- We still don't have access to the old documentation, this will be updated as soon as we get access to it or generate new docs6- At this point we only have access to the windows, MacOS compiled wallets and the source code. We don't have pre-compiled linux wallet yet. The new github link will be provided bellow in this ANNRoadmap:https://i.ibb.co/qnmpc6S/roadmap.pngProject details:Exchange:https://market.southxchange.com/Market/Book/DGM/BTCGithub:https://github.com/dgmcrypto/digimoneyTicker: DGMType: PoS HybridLast PoW block 48000 - PoW phase completedAlgorithm: X11Block Time: 180 SecondsDifficulty Re-targeting: Every BlockMax Coin Supply: 25.000.000 DGMPoS Block Reward From Block 48001: 10 DGMPoS Masternode Reward: 65%Coins Required For Masternode: 2500 DGMDefault Port: 33290RPC Port: 33291Old ANN Linkhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2700960.0Add notes to sync wallet:addnode=109.72.64.129:33290addnode=74.122.238.12:33290addnode=117.78.33.158:33302addnode=109.72.64.129:33290addnode=173.199.123.195:33290addnode=138.68.16.162:33290addnode=109.72.64.129:33290addnode=138.68.16.162:33290addnode=208.69.150.110:33290addnode=138.68.16.162:33290addnode=109.72.64.129:33290addnode=109.72.64.129:33290

comments.body: New block explorer created, some functionalities don't work because the wallet uses an old code. With the next version everything will be enabled. Network area can be used to get the addnodes for synchttps://explorer.digimoney.digital/

comments.body: Today was a great day, we were able to recover the main domainhttps://www.godaddy.com/whois/results.aspx?domainName=digimoney.info
